project.objective: FIBRESPIN is an innovative textile production machine, designed for producing spools of wool fibres (or cotton) with outputs 52% higher than existing machines. And due to the innovative design and use of high-tech materials, maintenance downtime is greatly reduced and the current problem of component breakage is practically eliminated. We at Cognetex, based in Imola in Italy, have been manufacturing high quality textile machinery for over 60 years, and we are one of the 2 principal companies in the world in our sector. With an annual turnover of approximately â‚¬1.2million we currently employ 30 workers and have a list of almost 270 customers throughout the world.
project.title: New Generation of High Speed FIBRE SPINning machines
